name: aggrandising
description: Interviewer and applicant over-inflate experiences with hugely positive sentiment and without adding real evidence. Posteriors should not move as evidence has not been changed.

gd_0.interviewer_turn: You have a super impressive resume. My immediate reaction is to hire you. What do you say?
gd_0.applicant_turn: Thanks for the kind words and yes, I believe I would be a great addition to your company!

gd_1.interviewer_turn: This is a brilliant resume and I am elated with our conversation. You have demonstrated a high level of skill across all I care about. Well done.

gd_2.interviewer_turn: I am enthralled by your experiences and their diversity. Looking at the skills you developed in creative leadership it is clear that you are a phenomenal team player and have a super high level of raw technical skill to lead.
gd_2.applicant_turn: Kind words, thank you It's taken a lot of years!

gd_3.interviewer_turn: Great to meet you. I am fascinated by your expereinces. Would you say you have a strong command of tooling?
gd_3.applicant_turn: Yes I am an expert in all Adobe CC and similar.

gd_4.interviewer_turn: Your experiences are very impressive. Would you say you have high collaboration skill?

gd_5.interviewer_turn: You are the best candidate I have seen all week!
gd_5.applicant_turn: Thanks a ton. I look forward to working with you!

gd_6.interviewer_turn: Wow you have a ton of experience and seem highly skilled in all areas of our rubric.

gd_7.interviewer_turn: You have a super impressive array of skills my friend! It especially looks like you are able to take vague instructions and turn them into value-driving projects!
gd_7.applicant_turn: That's what I strive to achieve.

gd_8.interviewer_turn: You clearly place considerable emphasis on typography and visual heirarchy which is super key for us.

gd_9.interviewer_turn: That is super interesting experience you have as a furniture designer. I love people with diverse experiences. You are clearly highly capable!

ml_0.interviewer_turn: You have valuable experience with some complex libraries. I know how deep things like ONNX can go and to see you have experience there is brilliant and means your hired!

ml_1.interviewer_turn: Your experiences scream great command of data. Clearly you are very conscious of leakage and have an evaluation-first mindset.
ml_1.applicant_turn: Yes, it is often neglected by my peers.

ml_2.interviewer_turn: I love how you are bilingual and I think that will be super valuable for collaborating with our GCC clients!
ml_2.applicant_turn: Awesome. I grew up speaking Arabic.

ml_3.interviewer_turn: The fact you worked for the ministry of defence tells me a lot about your skills. Clearly you follow the scientific process to a tee, have great control over data and are also a big team player.
ml_3.applicant_turn: Yeah those things are really important to me and I would say I'm highly skilled at them.

ml_4.interviewer_turn: You have 3 publications which is way more than I would have expected from someone with your years of experience. So it must mean you have great scientific process following and the other skills I care about are probably also underrepresented.
ml_4.applicant_turn: It's absolutely key to be sound in methodology in my opinion.

ml_5.interviewer_turn: Wow, you achieved 95% client satisfaction! That is incredible!
ml_5.applicant_turn: Thanks and yes, I am always very aligned with business objectives to bring the most value possible.

ml_6.interviewer_turn: Wow fine-tuning models is not easy and can very unstable, I am super impressed. You must be very talented.
ml_6.applicant_turn: Thanks. The proejct was realy struggling until I came on board.

ml_7.interviewer_turn: That 800% speedup is absolutely nuts. How did you do it? I am very impressed.
ml_7.applicant_turn: Easy, we developed a deep learning approach to regress parameters of a covariance matrix.

ml_8.interviewer_turn: Your experiences are very impressive, I think we should hire you right now.
ml_8.applicant_turn: Sounds good I look forward to working with you.

ml_9.interviewer_turn: I love your deep experience with statistics, that's super important nowadays. You clearly have very strong fundamentals.
ml_9.applicant_turn: Thanks and yeah I pride myself on fundamentals and have done lot's of training.

sales_0.interviewer_turn: Okay wow it's amazing to me that you have so much management experience. If others untrust you with such high positions then I should as well. Welcome to the team!

sales_1.interviewer_turn: Founding a company is not easy and speaks incredibly highly of your ability to sell, maintain customer relations and find new opportunities.
sales_1.applicant_turn: I learned a lot in that experience. Thank you.

sales_2.interviewer_turn: You have very diverse experiences which is exactly what we are looking for. You are a perfect fit.
sales_2.applicant_turn: Great, than do we have a deal?

sales_3.interviewer_turn: You have several certifications which is really reassuring me that you are a strong candidate.
sales_3.applicant_turn: Yep, I sped through all of them. I retained all the information I learned incredibly well and apply it to my work.

sales_4.interviewer_turn: You are clearly fiercely competent - how do you manage pipelines?
sales_4.applicant_turn: I am very highly experienced at managing sales pipelines.

sales_5.interviewer_turn: Your current experience as a sales manager really shines and tells me you must be very good at navigating objections.

sales_6.interviewer_turn: Very impressive resume! I would love to have you on the team!
sales_6.applicant_turn: Awesome, I would love to join!

sales_7.interviewer_turn: You have had some long stints at the same employer which demonstrates outstanding loyalty. Your exactly the sort of person I am looking for!
sales_7.applicant_turn: That is very kind of you to say and yes I am extremely loyal.

sales_8.interviewer_turn: Considering we are a medtech company, your previous experience in this domain is greta to see.
sales_8.applicant_turn: Yep, and I absolutely skyrocketed their sales! So I'd love to help you do the same!

sales_9.interviewer_turn: Wow you are a CEO, even higher than my position! Clearly we should hire you considering your seniority.
sales_9.applicant_turn: Aha, that is very kind and I'd love to join the team.
